positions.description:
I'm responsible for employing machine guns such as the M249/ IAR, M240B, 
M2 .50cal and Mk19 and aid the ground troops in support by fire and maneuver from a ground position or mounted from a tactical vehicle. I'm also responsible for the Machine Gun team in which was under my command. Doing so, I gained promotions up to the rank of Sergeant and the position of Team Leader-Section Leader. In this position I've learned Combative Skill, Strategic Thinking, Leadership and Combat Management Tactics.
positions.title: Infantry Machine Gunner

positions.description: I was responsible for providing telecommunications and computer network services to command centers to be able to connect with other command centers and NATO units abroad.
positions.title: Tactical Communications Switchboard Operator

positions.description: I worked at Toys "R" Us as a seasonal sales representative in the gaming and electronics department. I was responsible for providing quality customer service to costumers in need. There I ha d gained experience in People Skills and Management.
positions.title: Sales Representative

positions.description: During the summer I worked at the City Hall of New Rochelle. I was responsible for aiding the Administrative Clerks in preparing, organizing and filing legal documents. There I've learned better Organizational Skills.
positions.title: Administrative Assistant
